titles.title: A bill for the relief of Mr. Wilhelm Jahn Schlechter, Mrs. Monica Pino Schlechter, Ingrid Daniela Schlechter, and Arturo David Schlecter.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Byrd for Senator Biden without amendment. With written report No. 100-349.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 677.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.
Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on The Judiciary. Report No: 100-1046.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Message on House action received in Senate and held at desk: House amendment to Senate bill.

vote.text: Senate agreed to the House amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 11/4/1987--Introduced. Declares four named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
